de.weltraumschaf.minesweeper.model

Class BaseMineFieldBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • de.weltraumschaf.minesweeper.model.BaseMineFieldBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldBox
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MineBox, SaveBox

    abstract class BaseMineFieldBox
extends Observable
implements FieldBox
    Base implementation of a mine field box.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

        public boolean isOpen()
        Description copied from interface: FieldBox
        Whether a box is open or not. A open box can not be closed or flagged gain. If it is a bomb the game is over.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
